name: LOC Documentation
description: User documentation built on React.js-based Docusaurus 3
tooltip: I was the creator and maintainer, including the code gen/unit test tool I've developed. The site in the link is an archived version deployed on Vercel. For the official version, visit here.

name: Svelte/Golang/SQLite Full-Stack Demo App
description: A monolithic full-stack shopping demo app inspired by the book Essential TypeScript
tooltip: It gained more than 100 stars on Github after SvelteKit released <kbd>v1.0</kbd>.

name: MicroPython Driver for TEA5767 FM Radio Module
description: An open-source radio board driver utilizing most of the features in the datasheet
tooltip: A CircuitPython version is also available here.

name: SEFR Multiclass Classifier
description: First multi-class classifier implementation based on SEFR, a fast linear-time binary classifier for microcontrollers.

name: MakeCode Editor Extension for Nexus:bit and NexusBot
description: Driver package for in-house micro:bit expansion board and robot
tooltip: The expansion board is a KittenBot Robot:bit clone and the robot is a OTTO clone. My former employer changed the author name to his, however you can still find my name in the source code.
